title: Freedom Radio - A Voice in the Night [1941 - UK] WWII drama
description:
Freedom Radio (1941 - UK)                                aka A Voice in the Night

Drama / War
 
http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0033635/


An eminent Viennese doctor in Germany becomes increasingly disillusioned with the oppressive brutality of the Nazis. His wife, however, is flattered by the attentions of the FÃ¼hrer, and accepts a political post in Berlin. At first the doctor does nothing as his friends "disappear", but eventually, with the aid of an engineer, he creates a secret radio station where he broadcasts condemnations of Hitler and prays for a better Germany to arise from the ashes of his ruined country.


Video: MPEG4 Video (H264), 698x574, 23.976 fps, 1400 Kbps, 01h33m16s
Audio: Dolby AC3, 48000 Hz, stereo, 128 kbps

DVDRip, English audio, no subtitles
